game.name: Lux Leonarii - A Mechanical Puzzle Adventure
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lux Leonarii is a Puzzle game revolving around guiding beams of light throughout an ancient structure using a multitude of mirrors and devices, ranging from simple A to B connection to multiple colours and complex interactions.
